item.title: Straightforward Emacs: Show all unchecked Org Mode checkboxes
item.description: This is my first Straightforward Emacs blog post. Inspired by my video series, these posts will contain brief, descriptive write-ups of my favorite Emacs functions and features, problems I’ve solved, and short instructional guides. Many posts center on solving real world problems, especially with Org Mode, which I use to organize much of my work and personal life. I hope these posts will help you create and find solutions to your own problems.
